name: Megan Stewart
text: I love Hungry Howie’s in general but this place has good employees. They are always nice when answering the phone, which is a big thing for me. The food that comes out is always hot and tastes amazing! More specifically the wings, I don’t …More

name: Alysha Young
text: I honestly can’t help but laugh about this whole experience. I have not been to Hungry Howie’s in years, because there isn’t one close to where I live. I got a pizza and wings and was so excited. I finally got to my parents house and opened …More

name: Kathryn Adams
text: After 6 orders requesting Ranch flavored crust and all but one not having it, I’m no longer ordering from this location. I know it’s free flavored crust but when that’s the main reason you order, it’s extremely upsetting that the employees can’t figure out probably the easiest part of their job.

name: Justin Hudson
text: Have always had great service here and the food is hot and tasty

name: Kimberly Lyons
text: The garlic parmesan wings are great,  you have to ask for them because they aren't on menu but they will make them for you. The deep dish with the works is great also.

name: Joshua Holloway
text: do not know how to cut deep dish is very flat no sauce while Pizza no sauce did not cut both pieces just ordered it today got it at 6:07pm on Monday,January 29,2018 an they wanted 25 for it

name: Adam Leathers
text: Great pizza. Great price. And the Cajun crust is the bees knees!

name: Chris Raymond
text: Worst pizza I've ever eaten undercooked how do you do that no flavor definitely will not be back look like something that my kids made out of Play-Doh

name: Thomas Kobylas
text: Love the Cajun Crest crust and barbecue chicken pizza

name: tragic vampyrate420
text: The pizza was perfectly cooked cheese was gooey when taken a slice which means u know there's the right amount of cheese when that happens hehe the delivery guy was nice too and wore a mask as suggested for safety all in all perfect service I'll definitely order again in the future

name: Dennis Patterson
text: I like the Howie wings Spicy but not too spicy

name: Janice Fernandez
text: Good location, tasty pizza for cheap prices, and the delivery is fast!

name: Beno Btc
text: Great food good service everytime.

text: I love this location and the friendly staff. Pizza is absolutely delicious everytime !

name: Joseph Buckenberger
text: Good food, great service and a very friendly staff!

name: Daniela Young
text: Live in an upper flat, no front door for my apartment. Called ahead and asked for a phone call for when the driver arrives so I can meet them at the door. Never got a call, so An hour and twenty minutes after my order I have to call and …More

name: Gerald Slayton
text: Excellent service and The Best pie in town my name is Jay I order 3 times a week there will continue..

name: Karen Hudson
text: Don't walk in and order unless you want to spend ,30 minutes waiting for your order.  Seems they do better with on-,line ordering

name: chris Mercieca
text: Just awful. Howie bread didn't taste like it was cooked very well, still tasted very doughy. I ordered a well done, thin crust pizza and it was regular crust and tasted stale not well done.

name: Kristina Terry
text: Pizza crust was over cooked, howie bread was under cooked and the “extra” cheese they put on seemed to be non-existent. Have never tried this location but will never again. Much better competition in the near area for the same price. Very disappointed.

name: OneGloveGamer Awesome
text: Just called to place an order. They answered then very rudely hang up. Its 5pm. Guess their busy enough and do not need additional custermers at this time.

name: Val McPossum
text: Very nice staff, great food and very fast service

name: Joshua Stoddard
text: Fast and friendly! Pizza is always correct and the $15 meal deal is priced well!

name: Bill Duncan
text: Nothing about my last 2 pizzas was as good as they used to be. The sauce is different, the crust is different and there was over an inch of bare crust all the way around. It also took over an hour to arrive and was cold.

name: evilnineteen
text: Best hungry howies downriver. My go to for pizza night.

name: Kellee Brewer
text: Friendly staff, fresh pies.

name: Pam Schillinger
text: Quick deliveries. Good deals running all the time.

name: J Fred
text:
Love the flavored crust! Here for $5 meal deal, too pooped to cook, can't go wrong for a small pizza..enough for 1.
Tracey makes you feel like family when taking your order. …More

name: Rebecca Kowalske
text: Pizza is good, the app sucks so bad I rather call!

name: dabeast 2

text: Horrible service and bad pizza. Took almost two hours for a delivery.

text: The cheese bread is always flat and undercooked. Doesn't even compare to the other locations

text: Pizza was excellent and we always love Howie bread. My order of boneless wings was delicious as well. Great guy working counter- friendly and funny!

name: Steve Jones
text: An excellent place to be at! The staff is very friendly and welcoming! I tell my family and friends to order from hungry howies all the time. They always take care if me,the pizza is always fresh and made exactly how I order it!

text: Decent the first time, way better the second time.  Simply like a little extra sauce...

name: Jgl Law
text: Thanks HH each visit I feel like seeing family

name: Sergio Krzesowiak
text: This is the absolute worst pizza place in downriver!! Not only were they rude, they were very unorganized. Ordered a pizza and they said “25 mins” so I came in 30 mins later, and had to wait. Eventually I got tired of waiting and asked …More

name: Paula Ramsey
text: If you'd like to order one thing and receive something different. This is your place! …More

name: Nelson Beltran
text: Great experience. Fast service

name: Beth Yops
text: Called our order in because online didn't provide a place for their promo code, girl was nice found the code took order said to pick up in 25 mins. Husband went in Male employee read back order before charging his credit card. (So clearly 2 …More

name: Veronica Gullett
text: I loved the service at the front counter especially the mexican girl she is so nice!!! i think she needs a raise, she did her job and got my food ready in no time. very pleased!

name: K McShane
text: Good pizza they have there, especially their heart-shaped pizza they order only on Valentine's Day tastes very good. If you want to find a really good pizza, why don't you come here.

name: Shannon Wynn
text: Fast, clean, and delicious! Growing up my friends and I all worked at a Hungry Howie's, I have high expectations, and this location meets them every time! Once I walked in for my pickup order the same time as a Navy officer and they paid for his order and thanked him for his service! ❤

name: Emily
text: The pizza here is usually decent. I ordered today and not only did they forget the crust flavoring, the pizza made five people sick. Like throwing up sick.

name: Kara G
text:
Extremely greasy, flat cardboard pizza. I’ve had a better pizza from Little Caesar’s. Not the first time either.
Two stars because the delivery guy was nice.

name: Audrey Tolley
text: Always great food.

name: Moon Wolf’s Insane World
text: Screws up 75 percent of their orders and the only way they can make it right is to remake your order. It’s insane that you pay for something pay extra for delivery then have to wait for it to come back out time and time again and their business policy is we can make you another one and you can wait another 45 minutes. Come on

name: mark pantuso
text: Average food good service

name: Albo Abo
text:
Great food and also a great staff!
Very polite and we'll trained and if there is ever any kind of mess up they will reasonably go out of their way to correct it!
Highly recommended place to order from!!

name: Roger Greene
text: Always a great pizza and cheese bread

name: Jessa Rondeau
text: Excellent customer service!! Especially the girl at the front desk! She had my food right away with a big smile on her face! Came in on Tuesday at 7, will definetly be coming again.

name: William Adkins
text: Best Hungry Howie's ever

name: Marie Eichner

name: Jeremy C
text: I've eaten at this store for what seems like forever. Never had an issue, and the staff it's always friendly. The food always tastes amazing.

name: Nicole Lopez
text: Delivery guys are amazing and always so nice!

name: Crystal K
text: I called on my way home from work. 20 minutes, they said it would be ready for pick up. I sat there for an additional 40 minutes with no explanation. I'm done. Never again. Long time customers and 1 bad experience can ruin it. …More

name: Don Flamingo
text: The Wyandotte Hungry Howies is simply amazing and they have a great staff

name: Kenneth Johnson
text: The staff was very friendly. Even stated the lunch specials for me. Would recommend this HH to others.

name: Joe Jones
text: Very nice people great service

name: blake lukasik
text: I was given a time window for delivery of 1 hour. 2 hours later my guests were starving. Had I known it would have taken forever to deliver I could have come in and picked up my order. My guests were unhappy and after all the pizza was cold.

name: Richard Campbell
text: I used to go to this place a lot but the last time I went there the pizza I ordered hard had any cheese or toppings at all, it was mostly crust. How can you let something go out like that? This pizza looked horrible. I'm sure staff would not eat a pizza like this. How can you serve it? I will never go there again.

name: Jessa Rondeau
text: Came in today around 7:30, great customer service at the front counter! Came home to a hot delicious sub made perfectly, definetly 5 star rating for this Hungry Howies

name: Trevor Allen
text: Always a good choice, priced a little higher for chain pizza though

name: JoeltCola734
text: This will be the last time I order from this place. Just received THE WORST pizza I have ever had delivered in my life. Been coming here a while. Too bad :/

text: Always fresh. Done the way I want.

name: Samantha Justice
text: I like this particular location. The staff are pleasant.

name: brandon nickoloff
text: Everyone there is completely generous and they make the food how it's supposed to be a lot better than the other surrounding ones. And they honor expired coupons no matter how old

name: carrie tackett
text: Great veggie pizza

name: Lynn Alves
text: The food is mostly right, except when four or more of us order in which case there are small mix ups-no biggie though! My problem is their website. We enter credit information and place the order, then when they deliver they ask for cash …More

name: Dustin Hammond
text: EVERY SINGLE time I order from this location my order is WRONG. Anything from wrong toppings to missing condiments that you pay extra for. I finally had enough and called about missing mayo packets. Yes I know that is something dumb to call …More

name: Mike Wojcik
text: Took 3 hours to get our order. When the order arrived it was wrong. I understand being swamped but the manager would not make it right after we called to complain.  Poop.

name: Brendan Gutenschwager
text: Nice staff and the food is absolutely fantastic. They've surprisingly quick, too; often their initial estimated time given when placing the order ends up being half that in reality, and they've got their operations down pat.
